name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HP Print Service Plugin for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension HP Print Service Plugin is the only print driver that you'll need to easily print.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HP Print Service Plugin is the only print driver that you'll need to easily print documents, emails and pictures from print-supported applications to a variety of HP Printers, including HP OfficeJet, HP LaserJet, HP DesignJet, HP Photosmart, HP DeskJet and HP Envy.


HP Print Service Plugin is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your printing experience by allowing you to print specific areas of a webpage directly. With an easy-to-use interface, you can quickly enable or disable the extension, ensuring it only runs when you need it.


Key Features:


Selective Printing: Choose exactly what you want to print by highlighting text or selecting a specific area on any webpage.
Toggle Functionality: Control when the extension is active with a simple "Toggle" button. The extension starts disabled and can be enabled only when needed.
Visual Area Selection: Use your mouse to draw a highlighted box around the area you want to print, clearly marked with a blue dashed outline.
Simple User Interface: The extension features a minimalist popup with straightforward controls, making it easy to use without unnecessary complexity.
How It Works:


Click the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Use the "Toggle" button to activate the extension.
Highlight or select the area you want to print directly from the webpage.
Click the "Print" button to open a print preview of your selection.
Benefits:


Enhanced Control: Print only the content you need, saving paper and ink.
User-Friendly: The extension is easy to manage, with a clean and intuitive interface.
Efficient: Reduce clutter by printing only relevant information, cutting down on unnecessary pages.
Ideal for:


Professionals, students, and anyone who frequently needs to print specific webpage content.
Users who want a more controlled and customizable printing experience directly from their browser.
Get Started: Install the HP Print Service Plugin today to streamline your printing process and take control of what you print from any webpage.
